environment.description: Grace Period Policy for TDX Platform

reference.#NOTE: Replace the following configurations based on your own requirements
'accepted_tcb_status' must include 'UpToDate' and 'OutOfDate' if 'platform_grace_period' is defined
'platform_grace_period' allows you to pass appraisal verification even if the platform has expired within 90 days (7776000 seconds).
'collateral_grace_period' must be defined as 0  if 'platform_grace_period' is defined

reference.#NOTE: 'accepted_tcb_status' must include 'UpToDate' and 'OutOfDate' if 'platform_grace_period' is defined
